job_description: ResponsibilitiesDevelop and Maintain IOS applications that integrate with our enterprise applicationMentor and share IOS development knowledge with the development teamReview, maintain and refactor code as neededRun tests and fix bugsAssist in production supportResearch and investigate relevant technologies and alternative approachesProvide estimates for development effortContribute and adhere to the development, testing and release processesContribute and adhere to the coding standards and best practices adopted by the organization
job_requirements: Preferred SkillsSolid knowledge and understanding of mobile technologiesGood knowledge of motion co-processors used by Apple IncCore Motion + M series chips implementation on appsSolid understanding of Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC)Deep experience in IOS developmentSome knowledge of Android development (is preferred)Experience with iPhone location servicesExperience with REST, JSON, HTTP (Request/Response)Open To All Majors:No
